mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (id, username, password, id_card, birthday, sex, status, create_by, create_date, del_flag) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{idCard}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{status}, #{create_by}, #{create_date}, #{del_flag})
mapper.update: update t_user set id_card = #{idCard}, birthday = #{birthday}, sex = #{sex}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
